title: Collaborative Learning and Digital Badge-Based Information Literacy Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic information retrieval and evaluation skills, with experience using digital tools
context.additional_context: Language-integrated course for professional undergraduate students in medical/legal/technical fields. Strengthens information literacy through collaborative learning and digital badge assessments in bring-your-own-device (BYOD) settings

learning_goals: Learners can critically evaluate academic and practical information sources with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can write problem-solving reports applying information literacy through collaborative learning team projects.
Learners can achieve evaluation scores of at least 85 points across three areas (information retrieval, evaluation, and ethical use) via a digital badge system.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
